title: 56. Why Is “I Don’t Know” So Hard to Say?
description: Levitt and Dubner answer your FREAK-quently Asked Questions about certifying politicians, irrational fears, and the toughest three words in the English language.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
